home.game: Enter a game world full of adventure! Increase your level, choose the game you want, buy various items, and get rare items. Collect as much wealth as possible and prove yourself to be the best on the leaderboard!
home.cryptonft: Explore the world of crypto by buying and selling coins/tokens and NFTs to make a profit. Use the trading terminal provided to invest, trade, and become the best investor or trader ever!
home.walletminingstaking: With Crypto Wallet, you can store and send assets to other users. Additionally, earn crypto coins/tokens by mining, or staking to earn rewards and help support the blockchain network.
home.eventcompetition: Take part in various exciting events and competitions being held, and win attractive rewards, including rare itemsâ€”tax free! :v
home.blockchain: Every activity and transaction you make is recorded in connected blocks, forming a transparent and secure blockchain. All this data is distributed in the **[Topaz Network Center](https://discord.gg/AZ2FGGsDEz)** and you can see it on the server.

minigames.beginning: Here, you can choose a playing style according to your mood and personality. Would you rather relax, explore space, or fight against enemies?
minigames.chillmode: Relax in the virtual world! Work from your computer, become a famous streamer, and build your dream career. Collect money, upgrade equipment and enjoy digital life.
minigames.scifiexplorer: Explore the vastness of the galaxy! Fly on a spaceship, discover mysterious planets and collect valuable resources. Prepare the best strategy for a space expedition!
minigames.shootermode: Test your combat skills! Face enemies in exciting battles, upgrade weapons, and achieve the highest kill points. Can you be the best?
